name: Global Human Settlement Layer
description: GHSL provides analysis ready, global, geospatial data reporting about the presence of population and human settlements

SDGs.evidenceText: GHSL data allow calculating directly the SDG 11.3.1 (land use efficiency). The data are also used for generating information on SDG 11.6.2 (air quality in cities) and SDG 11.7.1 (urban green)
